name: Rebellion
info:
• 别名: Rebellion Developments
  • 别名: Rebellion Developments Limited
  • 别名: Rebellion Publishing
  • 别名: Rebellion Productions
  • 生日: 1992年12月4日
detail: Rebellion Developments Limited is a British video game developer based in Oxford, England. Founded by Jason and Chris Kingsley in December 1992, the company is best known for its Sniper Elite series and multiple games in the Alien vs. Predator series. Rebellion has published comic books since 2000, when it purchased 2000 AD, the publisher of characters such as Judge Dredd and Rogue Trooper.

works.name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War / 僵尸部队4：死亡战争
